# Series 3

## Exercise 3.13
```{python}
import numpy as np
```

### a.

```{python}
M = np.array([[1, 7], [4, 2]])
M
```

```{python}
N = np.diag([6, 5])
N
```

```{python}
P = np.full(shape=[2, 2], fill_value=-np.pi)
P
```

```{python}
Q = np.e * np.eye(1) + np.sqrt(2) * np.eye(2)
Q
```

```{python}
R = np.block([[M, N], [P, Q]])
R
```

```{python}
Null = np.zeros([2,2])
Null

S = np.block([[M+N, Null], [Null, P/np.pi]])
S
```

### b.

```{python}
np.shape(R)
```

### c.

```{python}
RS = R + S
RS
```

```{python}
R_t = np.transpose(R)
R_t
```

```{python}
MN = M @ N
MN
```

```{python}
NM = N @ M
NM
```

```{python}
MM
```

```{python}
NN
```

# Series 5

## Exercise 5.2

### a

```{python}
import numpy as np

A = np.array(
    [
        [24, 68, 0, -36],
        [0, 34, 82, -79],
        [5, 76, -33, 0],
        [-2, 0, -63, 65]
    ]
)

b = np.array(
    [
        [16],
        [-2],
        [58],
        [69]
    ]
)

res = np.linalg.solve(A, b)
print(res)
```

```{python}
import numpy as np
```
